roleset.name: able to be controlled
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8, relation to 'manage.01'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: He complains of some belly pain , but that is manageable .

roleset.name: accomplishable, but only by barely scraping by
roleset.note: Added by Julia, relation to magage.02

example.name: arg1
example.text: Getting through airport security in time for my flight is just not manageable.
example.arg: Getting through airport security in time for my flight
